TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NamedPipeClientStream extends System.IO.Pipes.PipeStream
Public NotInheritable Class NamedPipeClientStream Inherits PipeStream
public ref class NamedPipeClientStream sealed : System::IO::Pipes::PipeStream

summary.span: Exposes a around a named pipe, which supports both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.

span.span: Exposes a around a named pipe, which supports both synchronous and asynchronous read and write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具名的管道的管道伺服器與一或多個管道用戶端之間的通訊，提供單向或雙向的管道。Named pipes provide one-way or duplex pipes for communication between a pipe server and one or more pipe clients. 具名的管道可用於處理序間通訊，在本機或網路。Named pipes can be used for interprocess communication locally or over a network. 可由多個共用單一的管道名稱物件。A single pipe name can be shared by multiple objects. 任何處理程序可以做為具名的管道伺服器或用戶端，或兩者。Any process can act as either a named pipe server or client, or both. > [!NOTE] > 針對[!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/includes/winxppro-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/includes/win2kserver-md.md)]，最多 10 個管道可以同時會透過網路連線。For [!INCLUDE[winxppro](~/includes/winxppro-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[win2kserver](~/includes/win2kserver-md.md)], a maximum of 10 pipes can simultaneously connect over the network. ## Examples 下列範例示範將從父處理序的字串傳送至子處理序在相同的電腦使用具名管道的方式。The following example demonstrates a way to send a string from a parent process to a child process on the same computer using named pipes. 這個範例會建立父處理序中的物件。This example creates a object in a parent process. 物件具有的值。The object has a value of . 伺服器然後等候連接到它的子處理序中的物件。The server then waits for a object in a child process to connect to it. 在此範例中，兩個程序會在相同電腦上，物件具有的值。In this example, both processes are on the same computer and the object has a value of . 接著，父處理序會將使用者提供的字串傳送給子處理序。The parent process then sends a user-supplied string to the child process. 字串會顯示到主控台。The string is displayed to the console. 這個範例是用戶端程序中，連接到伺服器處理序。This example is for the client process, which connects to the server process. 整個程式碼範例，包括的程式碼的管道用戶端和伺服器，請參閱[如何： 使用具名管道進行網路處理序間通訊](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-named-pipes-for-network-interprocess-communication.md)。For the entire code sample, including the code for both the pipe client and server, see [How to: Use Named Pipes for Network Interprocess Communication](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-use-named-pipes-for-network-interprocess-communication.md). [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

summary.span: Connects to a waiting server.

span.span: Connects to a waiting server.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Connect ();
.method public hidebysig instance void Connect() cil managed
Public Sub Connect ()
public: void Connect();
member this.Connect : unit -> unit

summary.span: Connects to a waiting server with an infinite time-out value.

span.span: Connects to a waiting server with an infinite time-out value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫具有無限的逾時值的方法。This method calls the method with an infinite time-out value. 這個方法會變成可用的管道執行個體。This method waits for a pipe instance to become available. 可能會傳回前會從呼叫物件，但將不會傳回之前已傳回。 might return before is called from the object, but will not return until has returned. 寫入至管道之後的任何資料物件已連線，但之前已呼叫伺服器，將可對伺服器。Any data written to the pipe after a object has connected, but before the server has called , will be available to the server following the call to . ## Examples 下列範例示範從父處理序的字串傳送至子處理程序，使用具名管道的方法。The following example demonstrates a method to send a string from a parent process to a child process using named pipes. 這個範例會建立子處理序，然後再連接到本機電腦上的管道中的物件。This example creates a object in a child process, which then connects to a pipe on the local computer. 中可以看到伺服器範例類別。The server example can be seen in the class. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分和類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the and classes. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

span.span: The client is already connected.

summary.span: Connects to a waiting server within the specified time-out period.

span.span: Connects to a waiting server within the specified time-out period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會變成可用的管道執行個體。This method waits for a pipe instance to become available. 可能會傳回前會從呼叫，但將不會傳回之前已傳回。 might return before is called from the , but will not return until has returned. 您設定`timeout`參數來來指定無限的逾時值。You set the `timeout` parameter to to specify an infinite time-out value. 寫入至管道之後的任何資料物件已連線，但之前已呼叫伺服器，將可對伺服器。Any data written to the pipe after a object has connected, but before the server has called , will be available to the server following the call to .

summary.span: Gets the number of server instances that share the same pipe name.

span.span: Gets the number of server instances that share the same pipe name.

value.span: 共用相同管道名稱的伺服器執行個體數目。

span.span: The number of server instances that share the same pipe name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性傳回的伺服器執行個體的數目物件目前物件的控制代碼，或連線到。This property returns the number of server instances for the object that the current object has a handle to or is connected to. 如果目前物件還未連線至具名的管道伺服器，或如果尚未設定目前的管道控制代碼，這個屬性會擲回。If the current object has not yet connected to a named pipe server, or if the current pipe handle has not yet been set, this property throws an . ## Examples 下列範例示範從父處理序的字串傳送至子處理程序，使用具名管道的方法。The following example demonstrates a method to send a string from a parent process to a child process using named pipes. 在此範例中，物件會建立於子處理序，然後再連接到本機電腦上的管道。In this example, a object is created in a child process, which then connects to a pipe on the local computer. 中可以看到伺服器範例類別。The server example can be seen in the class. 這個範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分和類別。This example is part of a larger example provided for the and classes. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.Pipes.NamedPipeClientStream_Sample1/vb/program.vb#01)]

exception.span: The pipe handle has not been set.

span.span: The pipe handle has not been set.

span.span: -or- The current object has not yet connected to a object.

exception.span: The pipe is broken or an I/O error occurred.

span.span: The pipe is broken or an I/O error occurred.

exception.span: The underlying pipe handle is closed.

span.span: The underlying pipe handle is closed.
